urls.description: Europe's offshore and floating wind sector is experiencing unstoppable growth. Industry giants are scaling up to deliver more projects at multi-gigawatt levels and capitalize on the multibillion-euro market opportunity. The next 2 years are pivotal for achieving Europe's 150GW target by 2030. An incredible 50GW of projects must roll out across 2023-2024 but supply chain bottlenecks, aging infrastructure, and bureaucracy threaten to choke industry growth and undermine investor confidence. With € billions in contracts ready to be unlocked, it’s crucial to act now and overcome these challenges.  Join Reuters Events: Offshore Wind and Floating Europe 2023, Europe’s most senior meeting for change-makers. Hosting every major developer, supplier, investor, and policy maker:·  Network with the right decision-makers to establish critical partnerships for your business.·  Get your ground-breaking solutions across to relevant executives face-to-face during                       networking breaks
urls.title: Offshore & Floating Wind Europe 2023

Join us!
